typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SETID as string,
		PF_SRC_SYSTEM_ID as string,
		PF_SYSTEM_CODE as string,
		LAST_UPD_DATETIME as timestamp,
		MAPPING_COMMENTS as string,
		EFFDT as timestamp,
		EFF_STATUS as string,
		DTTM_STAMP as timestamp,
		OPR_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SrcSysCodeMap
source(output(
		SRC_SYSTEM_ID as string,
		SRC_DATE as timestamp,
		ACCOUNT_NUMBER as string,
		SRC_AMOUNT_TYPE as string,
		AMOUNT_TC as decimal(19,4),
		CURRENCY_CD_TC as string,
		BU_CODE as string,
		SOURCE_PROD_CODE as string,
		ACCT_RM_CODE as string,
		AMOUNT_FC as decimal(19,4),
		TENOR_MONTHS as integer,
		TENOR_DAYS as integer,
		OPEN_DATE as timestamp,
		CLOSED_DATE as timestamp,
		EFFECTIVE_DATE as timestamp,
		MATURITY_DATE as timestamp,
		LAST_REPRICING_DATE as timestamp,
		NEXT_REPRICING_DATE as timestamp,
		REPRICING_FREQ as integer,
		CUST_NUMBER as string,
		REG_LOAN_GRADE as string,
		HO_LOAN_GRADE as string,
		NPL_BORROWER_IND as string,
		BASE_RATE as decimal(18,0),
		BASE_RATE_TYPE as string,
		FINANCIAL_CAT_CODE as string,
		FINANCIAL_CAT_DESCR as string,
		INTEREST_SPREAD_RATE as decimal(18,0),
		NON_STD_FTP_RATE as decimal(18,0),
		ACCT_RATE_TYPE as string,
		ACCT_STATUS_CODE as string,
		ACCT_OUTSTAND_BAL as decimal(19,4),
		LOAN_INDICATOR as string,
		SUSPEND_INTEREST_IND as string,
		BRANCH_ID as string,
		CUST_NAME_ENGLISH as string,
		CUST_RM_CODE as string,
		ACCT_CURRENCY_CODE as string,
		NEXT_ROLLOVER_DATE as timestamp,
		NEXT_TERM_MATURITY_DATE as timestamp,
		CONV_ACCT_AMOUNT as decimal(19,4),
		LAST_ROLLOVER_DATE as timestamp,
		FI_INTEREST_RATE as decimal(18,0)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> FiAvgBal
source(output(
		ENTITY_ID as string,
		FISCAL_YEAR as integer,
		ACCOUNTING_PERIOD as integer,
		PF_SCENARIO_ID as string,
		ASOF_DT as timestamp,
		CURRENCY_CD_FC as string,
		SETID as string,
		ARCHIVE_FOR_YEAR as integer,
		ARCHIVE_FOR_PERIOD as integer,
		CPMS_SOURCE_DATA_DIR_PATH as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> RunControlTbl
source(output(
		SETID as string,
		TRANS_POINT_ID as string,
		TRANS_POINT_DESC as string,
		BRANCH_ID as string,
		EFFDT as timestamp,
		EFF_STATUS as string,
		DTTM_STAMP as timestamp,
		OPR_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> Tpoint
source(output(
		BU_CODE as string,
		CUSTOMER_OWNER as string,
		DESCR as string,
		FPL_GROUP as string,
		FPL_GROUP_DESCR as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> BuCodeDim
source(output(
		ENTITY_ID as string,
		PRODUCT_SOURCE_ID as string,
		PF_SYSTEM_CODE as string,
		CURRENCY_CD as string,
		ORG_UNIT_ID as string,
		EFFDT as timestamp,
		BU_CODE as string,
		PRODUCT_ID as string,
		PRODUCT as string,
		GL_ACCOUNT_EOP as string,
		GL_ACCOUNT_AVE as string,
		GL_ACCOUNT_INT as string,
		GL_ACCOUNT_FTP as string,
		GL_ACCOUNT_OBS as string,
		FISCAL_YEAR as integer,
		ACCOUNTING_PERIOD as integer,
		LAST_UPD_DATETIME as timestamp,
		UPDATE_COMMENT as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ProductTblMap
FiAvgBal, RunControlTbl join(SRC_DATE == ASOF_DT,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		ENTITY_ID = ProductTblMap@ENTITY_ID,
		FI_INSTRUMENT_ID = ACCOUNT_NUMBER,
		ASOF_DT = SRC_DATE,
		PF_SYSTEM_CODE = ProductTblMap@PF_SYSTEM_CODE,
		PF_SRC_SYSTEM_ID,
		BRANCH_ID = Tpoint@BRANCH_ID,
		ORG_UNIT_ID,
		CUST_ID = CUST_NUMBER,
		CHANNEL_ID = CUST_RM_CODE,
		SRC_SYSTEM_ID,
		SRC_AMOUNT_TYPE,
		AMOUNT_TC,
		CURRENCY_CD_TC,
		BU_CODE = FiAvgBal@BU_CODE,
		SOURCE_PROD_CODE,
		ACCT_RM_CODE,
		AMOUNT_FC,
		TENOR_MONTHS,
		TENOR_DAYS,
		OPEN_DATE,
		CLOSED_DATE,
		EFFECTIVE_DATE,
		MATURITY_DATE = BALANCE_EOP_AMT,
		LAST_REPRICING_DATE,
		NEXT_REPRICING_DATE,
		REPRICING_FREQ,
		REG_LOAN_GRADE,
		HO_LOAN_GRADE,
		NPL_BORROWER_IND,
		BASE_RATE,
		BASE_RATE_TYPE,
		FINANCIAL_CAT_CODE,
		FINANCIAL_CAT_DESCR,
		INTEREST_SPREAD_RATE,
		NON_STD_FTP_RATE,
		ACCT_RATE_TYPE,
		ACCT_STATUS_CODE,
		ACCT_OUTSTAND_BAL,
		LOAN_INDICATOR,
		SUSPEND_INTEREST_IND,
		BRANCH_ID = FiAvgBal@BRANCH_ID,
		CUST_NAME_ENGLISH,
		ACCT_CURRENCY_CODE,
		NEXT_ROLLOVER_DATE,
		NEXT_TERM_MATURITY_DATE,
		CONV_ACCT_AMOUNT,
		LAST_ROLLOVER_DATE,
		FI_INTEREST_RATE,
		SETID = RunControlTbl@SETID,
		LAST_UPD_DATETIME = ProductTblMap@LAST_UPD_DATETIME,
		MAPPING_COMMENTS,
		EFFDT = ProductTblMap@EFFDT,
		EFF_STATUS = Tpoint@EFF_STATUS,
		DTTM_STAMP = Tpoint@DTTM_STAMP,
		OPR_ID = Tpoint@OPR_ID,
		FISCAL_YEAR = ProductTblMap@FISCAL_YEAR,
		ACCOUNTING_PERIOD = ProductTblMap@ACCOUNTING_PERIOD,
		PF_SCENARIO_ID,
		ASOF_DT,
		CURRENCY_CD_FC,
		SETID = RunControlTbl@SETID,
		ARCHIVE_FOR_YEAR,
		ARCHIVE_FOR_PERIOD,
		CPMS_SOURCE_DATA_DIR_PATH,
		SETID = Tpoint@SETID,
		TRANS_POINT_ID,
		TRANS_POINT_DESC,
		EFFDT = Tpoint@EFFDT,
		EFF_STATUS = Tpoint@EFF_STATUS,
		DTTM_STAMP = Tpoint@DTTM_STAMP,
		OPR_ID = Tpoint@OPR_ID,
		BU_CODE = BuCodeDim@BU_CODE,
		CUSTOMER_OWNER,
		DESCR,
		FPL_GROUP,
		FPL_GROUP_DESCR,
		ENTITY_ID = ProductTblMap@ENTITY_ID,
		PRODUCT_SOURCE_ID,
		PF_SYSTEM_CODE = ProductTblMap@PF_SYSTEM_CODE,
		CURRENCY_CD,
		EFFDT = ProductTblMap@EFFDT,
		BU_CODE = ProductTblMap@BU_CODE,
		PRODUCT_ID,
		PRODUCT,
		GL_ACCOUNT_EOP,
		GL_ACCOUNT_AVE,
		GL_ACCOUNT_INT,
		GL_ACCOUNT_FTP,
		GL_ACCOUNT_OBS,
		FISCAL_YEAR = ProductTblMap@FISCAL_YEAR,
		ACCOUNTING_PERIOD = ProductTblMap@ACCOUNTING_PERIOD,
		LAST_UPD_DATETIME = ProductTblMap@LAST_UPD_DATETIME,
		UPDATE_COMMENT
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Join5 derive(ACCOUNT = " ",
		GL_ACCOUNT = " ",
		GL_CODE = " ",
		FI_TERM_UOM = 'DD',
		RATE_RESET_TYPE = 'FX',
		LAST_REPRICING_DATE = isNull(LAST_REPRICING_DATE),
		NEXT_REPRICING_DATE = isNull(NEXT_REPRICING_DATE),
		BU_CODE_DERIVE = 'SOURCE',
		BALANCE_EOP_AMT = 0,
		BALANCE_EOP_BCE_AMT = 0,
		INTEREST_AMT = 0,
		{INTEREST_BCE_AMT } = 0) ~> DerivedColumn1
Join1, ProductTblMap join(SOURCE_PROD_CODE == PRODUCT_SOURCE_ID
	&& RunControlTbl@ENTITY_ID == ProductTblMap@ENTITY_ID
	&& CURRENCY_CD_TC == CURRENCY_CD
	&& FiAvgBal@BU_CODE == ProductTblMap@BU_CODE,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join2
Join2, Tpoint join(FiAvgBal@BRANCH_ID == TRANS_POINT_ID
	&& RunControlTbl@SETID == Tpoint@SETID
	&& ERROR_FUNCTION('') == ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join3
Join3, BuCodeDim join(FiAvgBal@BU_CODE == BuCodeDim@BU_CODE,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join4
Join4, SrcSysCodeMap join(RunControlTbl@SETID == SrcSysCodeMap@SETID
	&& SRC_SYSTEM_ID == PF_SRC_SYSTEM_ID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join5
